summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Shilshole Avenue from 15th Avenue Northwest to 17th Avenue Northwest; and 17th Avenue Northwest, from Shilshole Avenue to West 47th Street, all in the City of Seattle, by replanking the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 3051 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
